Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game. The player has a name, health, position on the map, and an inventory of items. The player can move in cardinal directions within the gameâ€™s 5x5 grid. There are 2 different messages that can be randomly displayed each time the playr moves.
Author:
Ricky Nguyen

    • hasItem

      public boolean hasItem(String itemName)
      Checks if the player's inventory contains an item with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to search for in the inventory
      Returns:
      true if an item with the specified name exists in the inventory, false otherwise

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem(String itemName)
      Removes an item from the player's inventory based on the item's name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to be removed from the inventory.
      Returns:
      true if the item was found and removed successfully, false otherwise.
